channel.title: Home on Anis-Lahouar

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I’m Anis Lahouar, an experienced Game Developer from Tunisia, passionate about creating engaging games and gamified experiences for a fun and enjoyable experience. I have had the privilege of working with notable organizations such as Decentraland, Envast, and GoMyCode. At Decentraland, I served as a Game Developer, contributing from December 2022 to June 2023. During my tenure at Envast, I held multiple roles, including Game Developer from October 2020 to September 2021, Team Leader from October 2021 to November 2022, and Technical Consultant from December 2022 to April 2023.

item.title: Bubble Shooter
item.description: Bubble Shooter This is a challenge I have faced earlier in my career, and I felt it was due a redo to see how far I’ve come. Coming Soon...
